Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45142 affecting package kubernetes for versions less than 1.29.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45142 affecting package kubernetes for versions less than 1.29.1-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubernetes is earlier than 1.29.1-2, affected by CVE-2023-45142
